creator: todd@cfsilence.com
text:
org.apache.poi.hslf.usermodel.SlideShow fails when there are multiple master slides

Stack trace:

Caused by: java.lang.ClassCastException: org.apache.poi.hslf.record.Slide cannot
be cast to org.apache.poi.hslf.record.MainMaster
	at org.apache.poi.hslf.usermodel.SlideShow.buildSlidesAndNotes(SlideShow.java:320)
	at org.apache.poi.hslf.usermodel.SlideShow.<init>(SlideShow.java:121)
	... 39 more

creator: apache@gagravarr.org
text:
Hmm, I thought we did handle multiple master slides properly, but I'm guessing
there's a flaw somewhere.

Can you upload the problem file, so we can see what needs sorting out?

creator: todd@cfsilence.com
text:
I'm terribly sorry I was using an old version.  I upgraded to the most recent
version and everything works fine now.  Thank you.
